GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Seafood substitutions are increasing
articles.author: weegembump
articles.article_img_url: URL to the image associated with the article

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Fetches a single article by its ID

params.article_id: The unique ID of the article (must be a number)

article.title: The title of the article
article.author: The author of the article
article.created_at: The date and time when the article was created (ISO string)
article.votes: The number of votes the article has received
article.article_img_url: URL to the image associated with the article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to the specified article.

request_body.username: string (required) - The username of the user posting the comment.
request_body.body: string (required) - The content of the comment.
